itemDescription: English religious controversialist and hymn writer (fl. 1773–1791)

wikipedia_page.main: Maria De Fleury (fl. 1773–1791) was a London Baptist poet, hymnist and polemicist descended from French Huguenots. Little is known of her private life. The dating of her birth at 1754 and her death at 1794 are conjectural.
